thread.title: Aamir Khan not part of `Lagaan` 2?

title: Aamir Khan not part of `Lagaan` 2?
text: Aamir Khan not part of `Lagaan` 2? Sunday, 25 October 2015 (27 minutes ago) * New Delhi , Oct 25 (ANI): If sources are to be believed, then Aamir Khan won't be doing his 2001 hit 'Lagaan's sequel.* New Delhi, Oct 25 (ANI): If sources are to be believed, then Aamir Khan won't be doing his 2001 hit 'Lagaan's sequel. There were rumours that the 50-year-old Bollywood perfectionist was shooting the second installment of Ashutosh Gowariker's 2001 flick's sequel, but now sources clarifies that this wasn't true and the actor won't currently engaged in any such sequel. Notably, the 'Rock On' actress Prachi Desai has been signed for the sequel to play the female lead in the movie. Presently, Aamir is busy filming Nitesh Tiwari's 'Dangal,' wherein he will be seen playing the role of a legendary wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat in the movie. (ANI) Salman Khan, Aamir Khan Exclusive Dance KICK Arpita Khan Wedding Recent related news Aamir Khan is reportedly not working on the sequel of Oscar nominated sports-drama Lagaan. …read more Source:: IndiaToday… Filmy Friday 3 hours ago - Entertainment Hrithik Roshan said his upcoming show "Heroes" is not intended to compete with Aamir Khan's "Satyamev Jayate" and Amitabh Bachchan's "Aaj Ki Raat Hai Zindagi". Bollywood Life 4 hours ago - India Superstar Aamir Khan is reportedly not working on the sequel of Oscar nominated sports-drama "Lagaan". Indian Express 5 hours ago - Entertainment "It is completely false news (Aamir working on the sequel). It is not true at all," sources said.
